text: The modifier letter left half ring ( ʿ ) is a character of the Unicode Spacing Modifier Letters range, used to transliterate the letter ayin, representing the sound . It is encoded at . ==See also== * Apostrophe * Glottal stop * Glottal stop (letter) * Half ring * Modifier letter right half ring * Spiritus asper Category:Phonetic transcription symbols
title: Modifier letter left half ring
